code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Steps,Card,Row}from'antd';import{steps}from'./steps';import ProjectInfo from'./project-info';import DatabaseInfo from'./database-info';import UserInfo from'./user-info';import License from'./license';import ProjectAccessInfo from'./project-access-info';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const{Step}=Steps;export default function GlobalSettings(){const[current,setCurrent]=useState(0);const next=()=>setCurrent(current+1);const prev=()=>setCurrent(current-1);const onChangeSteps=value=>setCurrent(value);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"global-settings",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:"Project installation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Steps,{current:current,className:"mb-2",children:steps.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Step,{title:item.title},item.title))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{hidden:steps[current].content!=='First-content',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(License,{next:next})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{hidden:steps[current].content!=='Second-content',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectInfo,{next:next})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{hidden:steps[current].content!=='Third-content',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectAccessInfo,{next:next})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{hidden:steps[current].content!=='Fourth-content',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DatabaseInfo,{next:next})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{hidden:steps[current].content!=='Fifth-content',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserInfo,{})})]});}
